Scripts.OnEnter: if (MageNuggets.toolTips == true) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, ANCHOR_TOPLEFT); GameTooltip:AddLine("Toggle Slowfall Notify Messages") GameTooltip:Show() end
if (MageNuggets.toolTips == true) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, ANCHOR_TOPLEFT); GameTooltip:AddLine("Toggle Innervate Thank You Messages.") GameTooltip:Show() end

FontString.name: $parent_Text0
FontString.text: To disable the Shackle monitor, disable the Polymorph Monitor

FontString.name: $parent_Text1
FontString.text: To disable the Dispel monitor, disable the Spellsteal Monitor

FontString.text: Exit the game and add your mp3 files to the folder:

FontString.text: Enter the mp3 file name in the edit box.
